channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ND
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ND

item.title: Report X-2023071248
item.description:
Report X-2023071248

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-17T00:34:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: MINOT
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Top operated BOV cap leaked when the valve is closed. The cap is not sealing correctly and the valve is not sealing correctly.
